flex2.tools.oem

Class VirtualLocalFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • flex2.tools.oem.VirtualLocalFile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SinglePathResolver, VirtualFile

    public class VirtualLocalFile
extends Object
implements VirtualFile
    The VirtualLocalFile class represents a source file in memory. Each VirtualLocalFile instance is given a parent that corresponds to a valid directory in the filesystem. Path resolution is done as if VirtualLocalFile instances represented real files in the filesystem.

    You can not create an instance of the VirtualLocalFile class directly. You must use the VirtualLocalFileSystem class to create them.

    Version:
    2.0.1
    Author:
    Clement Wong
    See Also:
    VirtualLocalFileSystem
